description: Section 73 application for the variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning consent ref P2017/3679/S73 dated 5th January 2018 for the following alterations to the approved development: Minor amendment to front entrance; Provision of rain water down pipes; Additional 3 courses of brick at ground level to accommodate the ground floor window frames and railing; Minor change to the sub-division of the crittal window segments; Provision of internal fire lobby to each flat ; Additional skylights at roof level and reconfigured PV panels; Addition of external panelling on facade; and Minor internal layout changes to the flats.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 20/01/2018.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 20/01/2015 [LBI ref: P2014/0954/FUL].  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
